DzInstanceNode Class Reference
[Scene Items]

Class that create a single instance of another object target node. This instance draws the same as the target node except for transform. More...

#include <dzinstancenode.h>

void targetChanged ()

Detailed Description

Class that create a single instance of another object target node. This instance draws the same as the target node except for transform.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

DzInstanceNode::DzInstanceNode (  ) 

Default Constructor.

Member Function Documentation

void DzInstanceNode::draw ( const DzDrawStyle &  style  )  const [virtual]

Called by the frame work to draw the node in the 3D viewport. Derived classes should override this method to provide custom drawing operations in the 3D viewport. This method must only be called from inside a viewport drawing operation when there is an active OpenGL context!

Parameters:
style The view style and drawing options for the current drawing pass.

Reimplemented from DzNode.

DzEnumProperty * DzInstanceNode::getCopyModeControl (  )  const [virtual, slot]
Returns:
The enum property controlling how the node is instance (just the target or target and childern)

an icon that represents this node type
